g.text: QUICK REFERENCE CARD - Keep This Handy!
• Main entrance: Front lobby, turn left
• Sessions: All keynotes, plenary, parallel A
• Transit time to other rooms: 2-5 mins
✓ Collect name badge, program, conference bag
✓ Download conference app (QR code at desk)
✓ Emergency contact card (keep in badge holder)
• Multiple parallel sessions - plan your route
• Checkout by 17:00 if staying at venue hotel
• First Aid Station: Registration desk (Peterson II)
• Nearest Hospital: North Estonia Medical Centre (5km)
• Emergency Assembly Point: Main parking lot
• All rooms wheelchair accessible via ramps/elevators
• Sign language interpreters available on request
• Large print programs at registration desk
• Quiet room available: Alver & Adson side office
• Lactation room: Available on request (key at desk)
• Live streaming: Selected sessions on conference website
• Digital poster gallery: Available 24/7 during conference
• Tech check: 30 mins before each session
• Airport shuttle: Bus #2 to city center (€2, 25 mins)
• Public transport: Tallinn Card provides free access
• Walking: Old Town 15 mins, Port 10 mins
• Vegan Restoran V (200m): Plant-based fine dining
• UNESCO Old Town (15 min walk): Medieval architecture
• Toompea Castle (20 min walk): Parliament & views
• Telliskivi Creative City (10 min): Arts & culture
• Kadriorg Palace (25 min): Baroque palace & gardens
Full abstracts, speaker bios, interactive maps, and real-time updates

svg.text: ENBEL 2025: Connecting Health and Climate Change
Keep this guide handy throughout the conference | Download digital version from conference app
